text:
Dependencies between private packages is kind of nightmare:
```ERROR: Unsatisfiable requirements detected for package PrivatePackageA [1607262a]:
 PrivatePackageA [1607262a] log:
 ├─PrivatePackageA [1607262a] has no known versions!
 └─restricted to versions * by PrivatePackageB [61402b12] — no versions left
   └─PrivatePackageB [61402b12] log:
     ├─possible versions are: 0.2.0 or uninstalled
     └─PrivatePackageB [61402b12] is fixed to version 0.2.0```
I've installed both PrivatePackageA and PrivatePackageB into 1.5 env from direct github url. Then it all worked, but now I cannot install any other package because of this. PrivatePackageB has PrivatePackageA in `deps` , and no version for PrivatePackageA is specified in `compat` .
